Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and review the updated data quality checks documentation and implementation plan that were sent yesterday.
Begin executing the test cases for the implemented data quality checks. Document the results of each test case, including any errors or discrepancies found.
Encounter error and discrepancy in the ICD-10 codes. Contact @mrs-1, @mrs-2 and @his-2 to confirm the latest ICD-10 standards.
Lunch Break. Do some stretch to relax.
Collaborate with @ehrdev-1 to fix the bugs and errors discovered during testing. Provide detailed information about the errors and assist in troubleshooting. @PEOPLE: Bug Fixing Collaboration.
Re-run the test cases after the bug fixes have been implemented. Verify that the errors have been resolved and that the data quality checks are functioning correctly.
Update the test results documentation with the results of the re-run tests. Prepare a summary report of the data quality checks testing, including the overall success rate and any remaining issues.
Review the upcoming tasks for the week and prepare for the next day. Organize workspace and shut down computer.
